ComicInfo.Title: Payeru Attack
ComicInfo.Summary:
The travelers are prevented by their code from supporting a culture that harms its own planet, or from encouraging individual paths that keep the species or civilization from its ow destiny. Nor will they promote the good of the society above that of the individual. The only goal is "The Balance of Three" - Trivolution - the interlocking evolution of the individual, the civilization s/he lives in and the natural environment.
Central to the theme of "help" in the travelers code is the knowledge that one cannot help an individual without helping a species; that one cannot help a species without helping the environment of the species.
